dublin_core.dcvalue: Managing your diabetes can often be a struggle trying to balance eating medication and physical activity We as the CDE appreciate this struggle and therefore want to make living with diabetes a little easier If this sounds good then let us introduce to you the CDE Club The CDE Club includes important information on managing diabetes suggested steps to become more physically active and a platform to share your experience with others
Centre for Diabetes and Endocrinology (CDE) Diabetes Management App
